original_title: Как поссорился Иван Иванович с Иваном Никифоровичем
overview: How did Ivan Ivanovich quarrel with Ivan Nikiforovich? Ivan Ivanovich went to his bosom friend Ivan Nikiforovich, wishing to beg for the gun he liked. Yes, it didn’t work out. And in the heat of the argument, take Ivan Nikiforovich and call Ivan Ivanovich a gander. And take it and be angry. And what happened next ... Oh, what happened!
title: How Ivan Ivanovich fell out with Ivan Nikiforovich
